King's Dolabra.base_item: Iron Pickaxe / Iron Axe / Iron Shovel

Forest's Gambit.name: Forest's Gambit

Sketched Bark of the Gateway Tree.name: Sketched Bark of the Gateway Tree

Fox Frenzy.name: Fox Frenzy
Fox Frenzy.notes: The trader can be accessed via the underground tubes and is located at [-325, 67, -352].

Bouquet of Gold.name: Bouquet of Gold
Bouquet of Gold.notes: This sword is obtained by combining 4 flowers at the Tlaxan Crafter, each with a 1/1000 chance of dropping from specific mobs.

Aether Turbine.name: Aether Turbine
Aether Turbine.notes: The trader is found at [-517, 49, -70]. Go to Arx Spirensis, enter the giant tunnel blocked by gravel, and go left of the staircase. You will find another small tunnel, also blocked by gravel.

Rocket Boots.name: Rocket Boots
Rocket Boots.notes: The trader is found at [-517, 49, -70]. Go to Arx Spirensis, enter the giant tunnel blocked by gravel, and go left of the staircase. You will find another small tunnel, also blocked by gravel.
